1122317719238393857.text:
Best argument for value of financial sector?

Entrepreneurs want to issue long term/risky debt to make investments

Consumers want checking account they can touch anytime

Financial sector holds long term/risky debt of entrepreneurs, issue short-term riskless debt consumers want.

1122277079389622272.text:
Conscience - deep inner awareness f right and wrong, of principles that govern behavior, sense of the free to which our thoughts and actions are in harmony with them

Independent will - ability to act based on self-awareness , free of all influences.

1123361720410333184.text:
Credentialing businesses need to have powerful communities/missions to have evangelists.

The genius of TED, YC/VG(!), etc is they enable people to brandish credibility under the auspice of community/mission—otherwise, promoting the credential would be seen as too self-serving.

1114027303355305986.text: Here’s an on-going meta thread of some of my favorite twitter threads:

1122277080006160384.text:
Animals can’t do this. They can’t change their programming because they’re not even aware of it. 

Deterministic paradigm comes primarily from study of animals (and mentally ill people)

1122619982410477568.text:
Solve for biggest risk first.

What ppl often do is easy/low-risk things first, but nothing will increase self-confidence (+ anti-fragility) more than doing hard thing first.

Identify top 5 risks for your biz (& also applies elsewhere) + address in order of difficulty, not ease.

1122627280595898369.text:
Unpopular idea:

Glassdoor for ppl will exist within next 5 yrs, which means our fates will be even more intertwined.

While dystopian elements are obvious & scary, an increase in nonzero-sumness has tended to become a good thing over time. Maybe here toohttps://twitter.com/eriktorenberg/status/1120196750776516609 …

1122277081394454528.text: In fact, our most difficult experiences become the crucibles that forge our character and develop the internal powers, the freedom to handle difficult circumstances in the future and to inspire others to do so as well.

1123331923466522624.text:
Big misalignment between founders & VCs: 

VCs take dozens and dozens of shots on goal, founders only take one.

Founders should band together & share upside. VCs should facilitate this.

1122277080685637632.text: Of course, things can hurt us physically or economically and can cause sorrow. But our character, our basic identity, does not have to be hurt at all.

1122627780670132224.text: Then again, who knows. It's a pretty scary idea & requires a lot of cultural reprogramming.

1122277082057170945.text:
Levels:

At the 1st level, there’s an awareness of the space between stimulus and response. 

At next level it may involve a choice, such as not to get back at or to get even. 

At next level, to ask forgiveness. 

At next level, to forgive

And next level, to not take offense.
